channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NC

item.description:

item.title: Report X-2024010429
item.description:
Report X-2024010429

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-23T15:11:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-10
  • City: GREENSBORO
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: CALL WAS MADE TO THE DMP CAGE ABOUT A LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE. PACKAGE WAS FOUND ON THE FLOOR WITH THE CORNERS OF THE PACKAGE WET. FOLLOWING ALL PROPER RESPONDER METHODS, PACKAGE WAS SECURED BY RESPONDER AND RETURNED TO THE DMP CAGE TO BE PROCESSED
